data.title: Death Notice of Oliver Cahill (Caherdavin, Limerick)
data.meta_description: The death has occurred of Oliver Cahill of Caherdavin, Limerick Ireland, on 03/09/2023. You can view the full death notice and add your condolences here.
data.text:
Camira Court, Caherdavin and formerly of Rathbane, Limerick. Ex CIE and Conway Coaches.

On September 3rd 2023, at University Hospital Limerick, surrounded by his loving family.

Very deeply regretted by his partner Alice, daughters Alison and Fiona, stepsons David and Joe, grandchildren Sophie, Laura, Eoghan and Emilia, sons-in-law James and Keith, daughters-in-law Audrey and Teresa, sister Alice, sister-in-law Noreen, nieces, nephews, other relatives and friends.

The family would like to thank all the Staff of Milford Care Centre for their kindness to Oliver and to their extended family and friends for their kindness and support.

May He Rest in Peace

Reposing at Cross's Funeral Home, Gerald Griffin Street, on Thursday, September 7th, from 4pm to 5.30pm, followed by removal to St. Munchin's Church, Clancy Strand. Requiem Mass on Friday, September 8th, at 11am, funeral afterwards to Shannon Crematorium.

House private, please.

Family flowers only. Donations, if desired, to Milford Care Centre.

(To donate click here)
